snippet.title: Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles 2
snippet.description:
CASTLEVANIA THE LECARDE CHRONICLES 2

Available now

Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles 2 is a non profit freeware game created by Mig Perez. It is built on it's own engine and comprised of all new graphics, music, voice acting, and artwork. It is a sequel to the first game of the same name released by Mig in 2013. The game is available in multiple languages. 
ENGLISH FRENCH ITALIAN GERMAN JAPANESE SPANISH

Programmer: Mig Perez
Graphics: Mig Perez
Music: Jeffrey Montoya
Cover art: Nell Fallcard
Trailer editor: Dan Crowe

Cast:
Jeremy Montoya
Robert Belgrade
Douglas Rye
Donna Rawlins
Kira Buckland
Jeffrey Montoya
Timothe Catlin
CJ Evanson
Racheal Montoya

Download the game here
http://the-mig-page.wifeo.com/

Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles 2 is based on the Castlevania series created by Konami.

Thank you to all of you who have shown us support! 

Stay tuned for more exciting news and updates leading up to the release!
